item.title: Fun 3 - [Python] 2D Bouncing Ball
item.description: Introducing turtle and making your own class by building a bouncing ball simulator

item.title: Fun 2 - [Python] Pong in Pygame
item.description: In the second part of the Fun series, we are going to create the classic pong game using Pygame with concepts such as game loop, boundaries, and collision.

item.title: Fun 1 - [Python] A simple Hangman game
item.description: Post No. 1 of the Fun series, in which I demonstrate quick, fun, little game that you can code in Python with lessons that you can learn from.

item.title: How I created my blog using Hugo
item.description: In the last few years, static site generators have gathered lots of attention with the like of Hugo, Gatsby, and many others. These static site generators are mostly used for informative websites such as blog with features that help user to focus more on writing contents.

item.title: S1mone
item.description: A Virtual Personal Assistant with a robot interface inspired by the movie “Wall-E”. Your own personal assistant, equipped with facial recognition, voice recognition, and the ability to chitchat will be first among many other features.

item.description: A simple Pixel Art Maker written in Python.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Cuong Nguyen. I am a software architect / developer, with a bachelor degree in IT, and a master degree in Intelligent Adaptive System.
